pages.text: The only required Botania flower is the Pure Daisy, but there definitely many more that you will find useful, such as:$(li1)Orechid - overworld ores for heavy mana investment$(li1)Orechid Ignem - nether Orechid$(li1)Vinculotus - stops endermen from teleporting$(li1)Hopperhock - filterable vacuum block$(li1)Read your Lexica Botania for more!
All of these special flowers except the Dandelifeon and Loonium are crafted in the Teatable, a custom machine configured for this modpack.
